verses.verse: When a <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H1166>married<s%> <S%H4672>her<s%>, and it come to pass that she find no <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, because he has <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1697>some<s%> <S%H6172>uncleanness<s%> in <S%H3789>her<s%>: then let him write her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7971>send<s%> her out of his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And when she is departed <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, she may <S%H1980>go<s%> and be <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>'s wife.

And if the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3789>her<s%>, and write her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce<s%>, and <S%H5414>gives<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7971>sends<s%> her out of his <S%H1004>house<s%>; or if the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, which <S%H3947>took<s%> her to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>;

Her <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1167>husband<s%>, which sent her <S%H7971>away<s%>, <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H7725>again<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that she is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>; for that is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and you shall not cause the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

When a <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, he shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>, neither shall he be <S%H5674>commanded<s%> with any <S%H1697>business<s%>: but he shall be <S%H5355>free<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and shall cheer <S%H8055>up<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> which he has <S%H3947>taken<s%>.
No man shall <S%H2254>take<s%> the <S%H7347>mill<s%> or the upper <S%H7393>millstone<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge<s%>: for he <S%H2254>takes<s%> a <S%H5315>man<s%>'s life to <S%H2254>pledge<s%>.

If a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1589>stealing<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and makes <S%H6014>merchandise<s%> of <S%H4376>him<s%>, or sells <S%H1590>him<s%>; then that thief shall <S%H4191>die<s%>; and you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from among <S%H7130>you<s%>.

Take <S%H8104>care<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%>, that you <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3966>diligently<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H6680>you<s%>: as I commanded <S%H8104>them<s%>, so you shall observe to <S%H6213>do<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> what the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, after that you were come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
When you do <S%H5383>lend<s%> your <S%H7453>brother<s%> <S%H3972>any<s%> <S%H4859>thing<s%>, you shall not <S%H935>go<s%> into his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H5670>fetch<s%> his <S%H5667>pledge<s%>.
You shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, and the <S%H376>man<s%> to whom you do <S%H5383>lend<s%> shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> abroad unto <S%H2351>you<s%>.
And if the <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H6041>poor<s%>, you shall not <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H5667>pledge<s%>:

In any <S%H7725>case<s%> you shall <S%H7725>deliver<s%> him the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goes <S%H935>down<s%>, that he may <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in his own <S%H8008>clothes<s%>, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H6666>you<s%>: and it shall be righteousness unto you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

You shall not <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> that is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, whether he be of your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, or of your <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that are in your <S%H776>land<s%> inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

At his <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H7939>hire<s%>, neither shall the <S%H8121>sun<s%> go <S%H935>down<s%> upon <S%H6041>it<s%>; for he is poor, and <S%H5375>sets<s%> his <S%H5315>heart<s%> upon <S%H7121>it<s%>: lest he cry against you unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and it be sin unto <S%H2399>you<s%>.

The <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall not be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%>, neither shall the <S%H1121>sons<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1>fathers<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for his own <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

You shall not <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, nor of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>; nor <S%H2254>take<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%>'s <S%H899>clothes<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge<s%>:

But you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you <S%H6680>there<s%>: therefore I command you to <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

When you cut <S%H7114>down<s%> your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in your <S%H7704>field<s%>, and have <S%H7911>forgot<s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, you shall not go <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H1616>it<s%>: it shall be for the stranger, for the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and for the <S%H490>widow<s%>: that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

When you <S%H2251>beat<s%> your olive <S%H2132>tree<s%>, you shall not go over the <S%H6286>boughs<s%> <S%H310>again<s%>: it shall be for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, for the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and for the <S%H490>widow<s%>.

When you <S%H1219>gather<s%> the grapes of your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, you shall not <S%H5953>glean<s%> it <S%H310>afterward<s%>: it shall be for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, for the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and for the <S%H490>widow<s%>.

And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: therefore I <S%H6680>command<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.
